name: Penguin Hop (itch)
description:
Play as a Penguin and build and decorate your own igloo! To get the items you need, destroy icy snowballs with your jackhammer and collect the items to bring back to your island. When the jackhammer is out of energy, you can refill it by solving by writing the correct interval notation from a number line!  When you have built your igloo and found 10 items to decorate it with, the game ends, and you can screenshot your igloo, penguin, and results. A fun interval notation practice game that is non-stressful for math learners.
CONTROLS:
WASD key to move, Left Shift to run, E key to collect, and when the green target appears, click the right mouse button to place. Right mouse button to use the jackhammer.
